text:
Ekaviq(gm)qSa uqkthya#H sauqrIShuq prati#ShThityAq athOq ruca#mEqvA&&*tman dha#ttE saptadaqSO$&gniShTOqmaH prA#jApaqtyAsU#pahaqvya# upahaqvamEqva ga#cCati triNaqvAva#gniShTOqmAvaqBita# aiqndrIShuq viji#tyai trayastriq(gm)qSa uqkthyO# vaiSvadEqvIShuq prati#ShThityai viSvaqjith sarva#pRuShThO&tirAqtrO Ba#vatiq sarva#syAqBiji#tyai || 18
(praqjAqpaqtyO vA EqSha yaqj~jO yad da#SarAqtra - stri#kaqkuddhA - EqtA - vai - jA#yataq - Eka#tri(gm)Sacca) (A5)
